item.title: About @tuxedocat
item.description: I am interested in both theoretical and practical sides of Natural Language Processing. Currently working as a data engineer, I am trying to build a pipeline which is from data collection to analytics in not-data-friendly industrial applications. Skills and proficiency Natural languages Japanese (native) English (not bad: TOEIC 935⁄990, IELTS Academic overall 7.0/9.0) German (beginner) Programming languages Python 3.x bash Scala (beginner) … Frameworks and tools Linux (RHEL6, 7x / Ubuntu) PyData stack (Numpy/Scipy/Pandas/Scikit-learn/Jupyter) Apache Spark (Cloudera CDH) Git Collaboration tools such as Redmine, GitLab Experiences (Please contact me.
